johnny
Class JohnnyMachine

java.lang.Object
  johnny.JohnnyMachine

public class JohnnyMachine
extends java.lang.Object

A terminal for using Johnny Cards. Adds cash to a Johnny Card. Used for managing funds of a Johnny Card.

Author:
Liam McManus, Alan Cooke
